s: May 6, 2022 - When it comes to the software on iiRcade, the cabinets that aren’t branded for a specific game come with 11 pre-installed games (the branded cabinets come with whatever game’s artwork is on the cabinet). To be honest, I don’t feel like most of the games are worth writing home about.
